articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits May 9 Catfish Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits May 9 Catfish Farm
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the May 9 Catfish Farm which has turned into another model and standard farm for the country's pisciculture by putting its fish breeding on a scientific, intensive and industrial basis of high level.
					 When visiting the farm in December last year, he named it May 9 Catfish Farm in the meaning that its employees should work hard, always remembering the day leader Kim Jong Il visited it for the first time. And he personally chose the site for a mosaic depicting the tender-hearted image of Kim Jong Il and a monument to his field guidance to be built in the compound of the farm.
					
					 Kim Jong Un praised the officials and employees of the farm for having successfully renovated it while carrying out its production assignment, noting that servicepersons and civilians are supplied on a regular basis with catfish from the farm according to the supply system established by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He went round a monument to the field guidance of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and the newly-built room for education in the revolutionary history.
					
					 He said that the May 9 Catfish Farm is the country's first catfish farm built under the meticulous guidance and care of Kim Jong Il and he is a pioneer of the country's catfish breeding.
					
					 Then he toured combined control room, sci-tech room, incubation pond, indoor pond, water filtering place and other parts of the farm to learn in detail about its production and modernization.
					
					 He said that the farm has made a lot of achievements in the work to drastically raise the production of catfish without increasing manpower and production area, as instructed by him during his last year's visit.
					
					 The experience of the farm shows that a brisk drive for putting pisciculture on a scientific, intensive and industrial basis should be conducted by dint of science and technology to make a great success in fish breeding, he said, urging all other units in the field of fish culture to learn from the farm's experience.
					
					 He highly appreciated the feats of the officials and employees of the farm, scientists and technicians and soldier-builders who turned the farm into a proud edifice in the era of the Workers' Party.
					
					 Accompanying him were Secretary O Su Yong and Vice Department Director Jo Yong Won of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: DPRK Will Counter U.S. Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket with Tough Stand: Foreign Ministry Spokesman
articles.content:
DPRK Will Counter U.S. Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket with Tough Stand: Foreign Ministry Spokesman
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK issued a statement Saturday in connection with the U.S. ever more desperate moves to stifle the DPRK under the pretext of "human rights issue."
					 By taking advantage of holding chairmanship of the UN Security Council for December, the U.S. again tabled on Dec. 10 the agenda item "Situation in the DPRK" which it had referred to the Council for the first time at the end of last year, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 We strongly denounce and categorically reject the U.S. convocation of another meeting of the UN Security Council aimed at finding fault with the "human rights" in the DPRK despite opposition by many countries.
					
					 The U.S. put an agenda item represented by an ambiguous word instead of the expression "human rights" up for discussion in order to make sure that the "human rights issue" in the DPRK is included in the agenda items of the Security Council in the wake of the railroading of the "resolution" "Situation of human rights in the DPRK" at the 69th UN General Assembly last year. It also convened the first session by egging some member nations of the Council.
					
					 This time it suddenly organized a meeting which was not originally included in the December schedule of the Security Council by arbitrarily playing the role of chair country and brought "defectors from the north" to the sacred place of the UN meeting in a bid to fan up atmosphere of international pressure on the DPRK.
					
					 But at the meeting more countries than last year opposed the convocation and the discussion of issues outside the mandate of the Security Council based on clear reasons. This revealed the sinister aim sought by the U.S. in its farce and hardened the objective understanding that the U.S. anti-DPRK "human rights" racket is a product of its persistent hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The UN Security Council should not waste time by intervening in matters outside its mandate but concentrate on dealing with urgent issues of threatening global peace and security. It should handle such issues as the U.S. harsh tortures and the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises for aggression against which the DPRK had already brought a lawsuit, in particular.
					
					 If it is to deal with the issues of the DPRK, it had better table the issue of concluding a peace treaty which we proposed again at the 70th UN General Assembly this year in order to avert the danger of war and create a peaceful environment on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 We will counter with high vigilance and tough stand the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket being kicked up by the hostile forces including the U.S. which is getting all the more desperate in the UN arena.

articles.title: First Talks between Authorities of North and South of Korea Held
articles.content:
First Talks between Authorities of North and South of Korea Held
Kaesong, December 12 (KCNA) -- The first talks between authorities of the north and the south of Korea took place in the Kaesong Industrial Zone on December 11 and 12.
					 At the talks, the north side set forth constructive proposals to settle as soon as possible such most urgent and realizable issues as the resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang, reunion of separated families and relatives and reactivation of non-governmental exchange in different fields as required by the aspiration and desire of the whole Korean nation aspiring after reconciliation and unity, and made every possible sincere effort for it.
					
					 But the south side rejected the discussion of core issues like the resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang, resorting to unreasonable assertion which led the talks to nowhere.

articles.title: Leaders of United Malays National Organization Meet WPK Delegation
articles.content:
Leaders of United Malays National Organization Meet WPK Delegation
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Datuk Seri Mohamad Najib Bin Tun Haji Abudul Razak, chairman of the United Malays National Organization who doubles as prime minister of Malaysia, Thursday met the delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) led by Kang Chol, DPRK ambassador to Malaysia, which took part in the congress of the organization.
					 At the meeting the chairman expressed thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un for dispatching the delegation to the congress.
					
					 On Dec. 9 Datuk Seri Tengku Adnan Tengku Mansor, secretary general of the organization, met the head of the WPK delegation.
					
					 Saying the organization is rejoiced over the fact that everything goes well in the DPRK under the guidance of the WPK, the secretary general expressed belief that the 7th Congress of the WPK would mark an important historic occasion in developing the party.

articles.title: Chairman of International Military Sports Council Visits Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill
articles.content:
Chairman of International Military Sports Council Visits Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Abdulhakeem Mohamed Isa Alshanoo, chairman of the International Military Sports Council, and his companion visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Saturday.
					 They laid bouquets before the statues before paying tribute to them.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Minister Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister Back Home
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong and his party came back home Saturday after taking part in the high-ranking officials' meeting of the UN Climate Change Conference held in Paris.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Leaves for Home
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Leaves for Home
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Ministry of Energy of Russia led by Vice-Minister Anton Inyutsin left here for home on Saturday.

articles.title: Angkor Panorama Hall Opens in Cambodia
articles.content:
Angkor Panorama Hall Opens in Cambodia
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The Angkor Panorama Hall built in cooperation with the DPRK in Siem Reap Province of Cambodia opened on December 4.
					 Present there were figures of all social standings of Cambodia including the deputy prime minister who doubles as minister of the Council of Ministers, the senior minister, the minister of Culture and Arts, the minister of Tourism and the governor of Siem Reap Province and the masses, the DPRK ambassador to Cambodia and persons concerned.
					
					 A report and speeches were made there.
					
					 Sok An, deputy prime minister who doubles as minister of the Council of Ministers, said that the valuable friendly and cooperative relations between Cambodia and the DPRK were provided by Great King Norodom Sihanouk and President Kim Il Sung and they have developed on good terms under the great care of the leaders of the two countries.
					
					 He highly appreciated the fact that the hall was successfully built in terms of architectural and formative artistry thanks to the efforts by relevant organizations of the two countries and their close cooperation.
					
					 The panorama created by the DPRK's ace creators vividly shows the history and culture of the Angkor region, he said.
					
					 The hall will contribute to the economic development of Cambodia as well as the development of the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries, he added.
					
					 The deputy prime minister who doubles as minister of the Council of Ministers and the DPRK ambassador cut the tape for inauguration of the hall.
					
					 After the event the participants looked round the hall.

articles.title: Asia's Football Queens Heading to U-17
articles.content:
Asia's Football Queens Heading to U-17
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The DPRK team will head to the FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup next year as the Asian champion, according to the FIFA 2015 November review of international women's football.
					 According to the review, the DPRK team recaptured the continental title again at the 2015 AFC U-16 Women's Championship by beating its Japanese rival 1:0.
					
					 The review noted that Ri Hae Yon scored the decisive goal in the finals and also earned the Most Valuable Player award for her sparkling performances across the tournament.

articles.title: Many Industrial Establishments Built or Updated
articles.content:
Many Industrial Establishments Built or Updated
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Many industrial establishments for the improvement of the people's livelihood have been newly built or remodeled this year in the DPRK.
					 The Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill has manufactured barotor machines, thus making it possible to mass-produce schoolbags.
					
					 The Pyongyang Catfish Farm was fashionably rebuilt to breed catfish for all seasons.
					
					 The Pyongyang Corn Processing Factory was newly built, covering over 10 000 square meters of area, with its production processes put on an unmanned, dust-free and germ-free basis.
					
					 The Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory was remodeled, equipped with automated and unmanned production processes.
					
					 Meanwhile, primary efforts have also been paid to updating production processes at the Kyongsong Ceramic Factory, Ryongaksan Spring Water Factory, Kanggye Winery, Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory and other factories throughout the country.

articles.title: Chongryon Protests against Japanese Authorities' Unprecedented Politically-motivated Suppression
articles.content:
Chongryon Protests against Japanese Authorities' Unprecedented Politically-motivated Suppression
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The Japanese authorities' politically-motivated suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) has gone beyond the danger line.
					 Kyoto District Court on Dec. 10 held a trial of Kim Yong Jo, president of the Korean Goods Sales Company, and Ho Jong Do, the then employee of the company in 2010, on the charge that they illegally imported Songi mushroom to Japan from north Korea in violation of the "law on foreign exchange". 
					
					 The court at the trial sentenced Kim to two years in prison with a four-year stay of execution and Ho to one year and 8 months in prison with a four-year stay of execution and fined the company 2 million yens on the basis of the false evidence provided by the prosecution authorities.
					
					 It is clear that the trial was a product of the Japanese authorities' hostile policy towards the DPRK and their moves to stamp out Chongryon as the judgment was made on groundless charge without a serious examination.
					
					 At the end of the trial the compatriots' defense counsel held a press conference before the court at which it termed the court decision an utterly unjust one as it falsified truth.
					
					 After the press conference Chongryon officials and other Koreans in Japan who had attended the trial held an emergency meeting at the hall of Kyoto lawyers to condemn the decision.

articles.title: Japanese Judicial Authorities' Fascist Judgment under Fire
articles.content:
Japanese Judicial Authorities' Fascist Judgment under Fire
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), issued a statement on Dec. 10 in protest against the Japanese judicial authorities' illegal and fascist judgment.
					 The statement accused the Kyoto District Court of sentencing Kim Yong Jo, president of the Korean Goods Sales Company, to two years in prison with a four-year stay of execution and Ho Jong Do, a staff of Kim's company, to one year and eight months in prison with a four-year stay of execution, and fining the company two million yens on charges of the violation of the "law on foreign exchange".
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 The recent judgment is a manifestation of the Japanese authorities' hostile policy towards the DPRK and discrimination and persecution against the Korean residents in Japan pursuant to the policy, and clearly shows that the judicial authorities actively joined in the crackdown upon Chongryon.
					
					 Its aim is to deal a blow at Chongryon by building up public opinion against the DPRK and Chongryon among the Japanese by labeling it as a "criminal organization" at any cost.
					
					 The recent judgment will bring serious consequences to the DPRK-Japan relations and the judge who made the unprecedented mistake in history of the Japanese judiciary being subservient to power will never be free from remorse for his crimes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on U.S. "War on Terrorism"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on U.S. "War on Terrorism"
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article says that the terrorism is one of those that the world community awaits an immediate solution.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Every country should see through the U.S. criminal intention in "war on terrorism".
					
					 Failure to see through the sinister intention of U.S. hidden behind the mask of "war on terrorism" may plunge many countries and people who suffered from the U.S. "war on terrorism" for the past decade into tragic fate again.
					
					 The U.S. thinks if there is no "enemy", there will be no pretext to set up the military bases in other countries and this will deprive it of a signboard for dominating the world.
					
					 The U.S. has committed terrorism against other countries and abused rights of people there under the pretext of "war on terrorism".
					
					 The U.S. seeks the goal of bringing down the countries standing in its way of realizing the strategy of the world domination. But as it advocates defending "freedom and democracy" some countries failed to see through the goal sought by it only to sustain misfortune and pains and fall into the evil cycle of confusion and disorder.
					
					 The U.S. "war on terrorism" should no longer be allowed, otherwise the humankind will see the repetition of terrorist acts such as what happened in Afghanistan, Iraq, Libya, Turkey, Egypt, France, Lebanon and Mali.

articles.title: Paper of International Kothongryon Introduces DPRK
articles.content:
Paper of International Kothongryon Introduces DPRK
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Thongil, paper of the International United Confederation of Koreans (International Kothongryon), carried a special write-up on Nov. 26.
					 It carried a photo-accompanied article introducing successfully built Mirae Scientists Street under the headline "The appearance of capital city of DPRK is undergoing changes."
					
					 The street is a gift presented by the Workers' Party of Korea to the educators and scientists of the country on the occasion of its 70th founding anniversary, the article said.
					
					 The paper also carried an article titled "Visiting Pyongyang Folklore Park, pride of nation" together with photos of the park.

articles.title: Large-Scale Actions to Be Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Large-Scale Actions to Be Staged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a meeting before the building of the "government" in Seoul on Dec. 10 at which it clarified its stand to launch large-scale actions against the authorities' crackdown and moves for abusing the right to existence, according to the south Korean newspaper Nodong and Segye.
					 Speakers at the meeting accused the authorities of arresting the chairman of the confederation who spearheaded the workers' struggle for the right to existence.
					
					 They declared that they would stage an action for judging the "government" through a general strike to be launched on Dec. 16 and the 3rd all-out people's action slated to take place on Dec. 19.
					
					 They called on all workers to turn out in the general strike for checking retrogressive revision of labor law.

articles.title: Koreans in Uzbekistan Mark Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise
articles.content:
Koreans in Uzbekistan Mark Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The "Old Men" Association for Korean Cultural Tradition in Uzbekistan held a photo exhibition and remembrance concert on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display at the venue of the event were photos of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and those of Kim Jong Il receiving former south Korean "presidents."
					
					 Also exhibited there were photos of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and October 4 declaration and events for reunification held in the June 15 era.
					
					 Ko Tae Chun, vice chairman of the association, praised Generalissimo Kim Jong Il for performing great exploits in politics, military, economy, culture and all other fields while leading the DPRK for decades.
					
					 He called on Koreans to get firmly united under the banner of the above-said declarations, true to the last instructions of Kim Jong Il for national reunification and turn out as one in the drive for the reunification and prosperity of the nation.

articles.title: DPRK Cartoon Production Introduced by Chinese Media
articles.content:
DPRK Cartoon Production Introduced by Chinese Media
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The Phoenix Satellite TV Holdings LTD., Hong Kong, China introduced the cartoon production of the DPRK on December 8.
					 The media said that the DPRK cartoon production has already reached a world level.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The DPRK's cartoons are popular in the international community.
					
					 The series of the Korean cartoon "The Boy General" which have recently been created are popular not only among the Korean people but also among foreigners.
					
					 The Korean April 26 Cartoon Film Studio has created the world-level famous cartoons and it is well known to the international community.
					
					 Famous cartoon producers of different countries greatly admire high cartoon production level of the DPRK and are asking for cooperation.
					
					 The Korean cartoons are peculiar for Korean-style high artistry.
					
					 They are rich in content and reflect versatile themes including revolutionary education, common sense in history and the juvenile education.
					
					 The DPRK will emerge as a world cartoon power in the near future.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried in Bulletin of Mexican Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried in Bulletin of Mexican Organization
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The detailed gist of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was carried by the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea in its bulletin on December 7.
					 The work, made public on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem forever as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and indicates the tasks for steadily developing the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Ethiopia
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Events for remembering leader Kim Jong Il took place in Ethiopia on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of his demise.
					 Seminars were held by branches of the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism－Kimjongilism and round-table talks at an enterprise and hospitals of Ethiopia between December 3 and 7.
					
					 The chief of the Kolfe Branch of the National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism－Kimjongilism said that Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, devoted his all to the cause of reunification of the Korean nation.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the Three Principle of National Reunification, the 10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation and a proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo which were advanced by President Kim Il Sung as the Three Charters for National Reunification in his work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" made public on August, 1997.
					
					 He opened up an era of By Our Nation Itself and a new era of independent reunification by making sure that the historic June 15 Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration were adopted.
					
					 This is a noteworthy exploit to be specially recorded in the history of the Korean nation.
					
					 Praising his Songun leadership exploits, the chief said that Kim Jong Il is always alive in the hearts of not only the Korean people but the progressive mankind as a peerlessly great man.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Meetings for remembering leader Kim Jong Il took place in Denmark, Poland and Guinea between December 1 and 5.
					 Displayed at the venues of the meetings were photos dealing with exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Exhibited there were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing the struggle of the Korean people for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association said in a speech that Kim Jong Il aroused the army and people of the DPRK to defending the sovereignty of the country, holding aloft the banner of Songun, at a time when the imperialists were making desperate efforts to stifle socialist Korea and provided a firm foundation for building a thriving nation.
					
					 And he made an immortal contribution to the cause of national reunification and the world peace and its security.
					
					 The secretary general of the Polish branch of the Korean Friendship Association and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il for turning the DPRK into a matchless political and ideological power and military power by pursuing Songun politics, saying that his exploits will last forever.
					
					 The permanent secretary of the Guinean People's Assembly referred to the fact that the Workers' Party of Korea has developed into an invincible party that has achieved the steel-like unity and cohesion with the popular masses and a mother party being absolutely supported and trusted by the people thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The permanent secretary said that Kim Jong Il would be alive forever in the hearts of the progressive mankind as he performed exploits for the global cause of independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Exploits Praised by British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Exploits Praised by British Organization
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a bulletin on Dec. 6 on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The bulletin carried articles titled "In days of December" and others accompanied with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The article titled "HE Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary exploits will shine forever" said:
					
					 Though four years have passed since he passed away, his Songun revolutionary exploits are further shining.
					
					 He was a genius of creation and construction and father who most valued the people.
					
					 He was a master of ideology and theory and a great master of leadership who comprehensively developed in depth the Juche idea.
					
					 He firmly defended the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK by pursuing the Songun politics.
					
					 He was a great defender of the cause of socialism, who held higher the red flag at a time when the socialism collapsed in different countries.
					
					 The June 15 North-South Joint Declaration is a fruition of indefatigable efforts of Kim Jong Il who devoted himself to the reunification of the country.
					
					 He is always alive in the hearts of the followers of the Juche idea and Songun idea in UK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Events took place in foreign countries to commemorate the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 A remembrance meeting was held in Ecuador, a seminar, book and photo exhibition and film show in India and film show in Indonesia from Dec. 4 to 7.
					
					 Trotsky Serano, secretary general of the Ecuadorian Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, said in his speech that Kim Jong Il was the peerless patriot and great revolutionary who defended the sovereignty of the country and nation and guaranteed the ever-lasting happiness of the Korean people, and prominent leader of the world socialist movement.
					
					 He stressed that Kim Jong Il's greatest exploit was that he firmly defended socialist Korea from the imperialists' moves to stifle it and global cause of independence and ensured peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of the world.
					
					 Milton Burbano Bohorquez, chairman of the Ecuadorian Cultural Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that the whole life of Kim Jong Il was one of devotion to the Korean people's happiness and cause of the country's independent and peaceful reunification and global cause of independence and his revolutionary idea and exploits would be immortal.
					
					 B. C. Gupta, chairman of the Juche Idea Study Society of Indian Delhi, said at the seminar that Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, was the great master of the independent politics who performed the undying feats for the Korean revolution and human cause of independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige labores de Fabrica de Siluros 9 de Mayo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige labores de Fabrica de Siluros 9 de Mayo
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno las labores de la Fabrica de Siluros 9 de Mayo, convertida en la planta ejemplar y modelo de la rama de piscicultura del pais, donde fueron perfeccionadas la cientifizacion, intensificacion e industrializacion.
					Durante su visita en diciembre del ano pasado, el Mariscal denomino la fabrica como la de Siluros 9 de Mayo en el sentido de trabajar bien inolvidando aquel dia historico en que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il realizo su primera visita, y tomo en el recinto de la fabrica el solar necesario a levantar la pintura de mosaico de imagen afectuosa del Dirigente y el monumento en memoria de la visita de orientacion.
					
					Segun el sistema de suministro establecido por el Dirigente los militares y habitantes reciben normalmente los siluros producidos por esta fabrica, dijo y elogio a los funcionarios y empleados senalando que hicieron muchos esfuerzos por remodelar excelentemente la fabrica y cumplir las tareas de produccion.
					
					Luego de ver el monumento en memoria de la visita de orientacion de los grandes hombres sin pares, recorrio la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria, nuevamente construida.
					
					Subrayo que esta fabrica es la primera de siluros del pais levantada bajo la minuciosa direccion y atencion del Dirigente y agrego que Kim Jong Il es el precursor de la piscifactoria de siluros de Corea.
					
					Pasando por la sala de control general, la sala de divulgacion cientifica y tecnica, el edificio de incubacion, el criadero bajo techo, el lugar de filtracion de agua, la fabrica de pienso Phaenghwa y otros puntos, hizo detallado conocimiento del estado de la produccion y la modernizacion.
					
					Enfatizo que la fabrica logro muchos exitos en la labor por aumentar la produccion de siluros sin incrementar la mano de obra y el area de produccion cumplimentando la tarea dada durante la visita del ano pasado.
					
					Destaco que las experiencias de la fabrica demuestran la necesidad de esforzarse activamente por la fundamentacion cientifica, la intensificacion y la industrializacion de la piscicultura tomando las ciencias y tecnicas para lograr mayores exitos en la cria de peces y anadio que todas las unidades de la rama de piscifactoria deben aprender las experiencias de esta fabrica.
					
					Evaluo altamente las proezas laborales de los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica, los cientificos, tecnicos y constructores militares, quienes convirtieron magnificamente la fabrica en la creacion orgullosa de la epoca del Partido del Trabajo.
					
					Le acompanaron O Su Yong, secretario del Comite Central del PTC, y Jo Yong Won, subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: MINREX denuncia maniobras de "DDHH" de EE.UU. y fuerzas hostiles contra RPDC
articles.content:
MINREX denuncia maniobras de "DDHH" de EE.UU. y fuerzas hostiles contra RPDC
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 12 una declaracion en relacion con que se tornan cada dia mas atroces las maniobras de Estados Unidos tendentes a aplastar a la RPDC so pretexto del "problema de derechos humanos".
					Aprovechando la oportunidad de haber ocupado la presidencia de diciembre del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, Estados Unidos organizo una reunion para volver a discutir la agenda de "La situacion en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea" que habia presentado por la fuerza por primera vez a finales del ano pasado, revela el documento y prosigue:
					
					La RPDC denuncia rotundamente y rechaza totalmente que EE.UU. convoco otra reunion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU para cuestionar el "problema de derechos humanos" de la RPDC pese a la oposicion de muchos paises.
					
					Despues de haber sido aprobada por fuerza la "resolucion" de "La situacion de DDHH en la RPDC" en el 69o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU del ano pasado, EE.UU. presento una agenda con el titulo ambiguo eliminando la expresion "DDHH" para incluir forzosamente el "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC en la agenda del CS y convoco por fuerza la convocacion de la reunion por primera vez incitando a unos paises miembros del CS.
					
					Pero, en esta ocasion como pais presidente convoco de manera arbitraria y sorpresa la reunion no prevista en el programa oficial de diciembre del CS, introdujo y presento en el sagrado lugar de la reunion de la ONU hasta los "criminales que huyeron del Norte de Corea" despues de cometer los delitos, de manera que hizo todos los esfuerzos desesperados por inculcar el ambiente de presion internacional contra la RPDC.
					
					Pero, en la presente reunion muchos paises mas que en el ano pasado se opusieron con los argumentos claros a la convocacion de la reunion fuera de la facultad del Consejo de Seguridad y a la misma discusion del problema, debido a lo cual fue revelada fehacientemente la farsa obstinada y la vil ambicion de EE.UU. y confirmada mas la comprension objetiva de que los incesantes alborotos de "derechos humanos" de EE.UU. contra la RPDC son el producto de la insistente politica hostil a esta.
					
					El CS de la ONU no debe malgastar el tiempo interviniendo hasta en los trabajos fuera de su facultad, sino entregarse a resolver los problemas urgentes que amenazan la paz y la seguridad del mundo, especialmente a tratar primero los problemas sometidos por la RPDC incluyendo los actos de tortura de categoria especial de EE.UU. y los agresivos ejercicios militares conjuntos EE.UU.-el Sur de Corea.
					
					Si quiere discutir el problema de la RPDC seria mejor abordar la concertacion del convenio de paz que la RPDC volvio a presentar en el 70o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU con el objetivo de eliminar el peligro de guerra y preparar el ambiente pacifico en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					La RPDC se enfrentara fuertemente hasta el fin con alta vigilancia a las maniobras de "derechos humanos" anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles que se tornan cada dia mas perversas en la ONU.

articles.title: Tienen lugar primeras conversaciones entre autoridades N-S de Corea
articles.content:
Tienen lugar primeras conversaciones entre autoridades N-S de Corea
Kaesong, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar los dias 11 y 12 en la Zona Industrial de Kaesong las primeras conversaciones entre las autoridades del Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					En la ocasion, la parte nortena presento las propuestas constructivas de resolver lo mas pronto posible el problema de reanudacion del turismo al monte Kumgang y el de encuentro de los familiares y parientes separados, mas inminentes y posibles y de activar el intercambio a nivel civil en varias esferas e hizo sinceros esfuerzos por el particular.
					
					Sin embargo, la parte surena se obstino en las injustas insistencias negando la discusion del problema fundamental como la reanudacion del turismo al monte Kumgang.
					
					Debido a tal posicion y actitud negativas de la parte surena, las presentes conversaciones resultaron infructiferas.

Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Kim Je Son
Pyongyang, 11 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 11 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Kim Je Son, laureado con la Orden Kim Il Sung y el Premio Kim Il Sung, Artista del Pueblo y jefe-asesor del Conjunto Artistico Mansudae, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Rubricado plan sobre cooperacion entre gobiernos de RPDC y de Bulgaria

Rubricado plan sobre cooperacion entre gobiernos de RPDC y de Bulgaria
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Quedo firmado el dia 8 en Sofia de Bulgaria el plan sobre la cooperacion en el dominio de ciencia, educacion y cultura entre los gobiernos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica de Bulgaria.
					Firmaron el documento el embajador coreano en Bulgaria, Cha Kon Il, y el ministro de Educacion y Ciencia de Bulgaria, Todor Tanev.

articles.title: FIFA presenta equipo coreano de futbol femenino sub-16
articles.content:
FIFA presenta equipo coreano de futbol femenino sub-16
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Hace poco, la FIFA hizo balance del noviembre de 2015 de futbol femenino internacional, ocasion en la cual presento al equipo femenino sub-16 de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea como "reina de Asia".
					Segun ella, en el Campeonato Femenino Sub-16 de la Confederacion Asiatica de Futbol 2015 el equipo coreano salio victorioso venciendo a su rival japonesa por 1:0.
					
					Presento a la futbolista Ri Hae Yon, quien recibio el premio de jugadora sobresaliente al marcar goles en la competencia con Taipei China, en la semifinal con China y en la final con Japon, y que el equipo coreano logro el boleto para la Copa Mundial (f) Sub-17 de la FIFA 2016.
					
					Recordo que el equipo coreano se hizo la campeona asiatica en la competencia de 2007 efectuada por primera vez.
					
					Reporto que desde 2008, las coreanas participaron sucesivamente en representacion de Asia en la Copa Mundial (f) Sub-17 que tiene lugar cada dos anos y destaco que en el primer conclave de 2008 salio victorioso y en 2012 obtuvieron la medalla de plata. Enfatizo que en las competencias la futbolista Jon Myong Hwa recibio el premio de bota de futbol de bronce, Ri Un Sim, el premio de bota de futbol de oro y Ri Hyang Sim, el premio de pelota de plata.
					
					El equipo coreano ocupo el segundo lugar en el Campeonato Femenino Sub-16 de la Confederacion Asiatica de Futbol 2009, 2011 y 2013.

articles.title: No hay que tolerar mas la "guerra terrorista" de EE.UU., insiste Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No hay que tolerar mas la "guerra terrorista" de EE.UU., insiste Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En la actualidad, el terrorismo es uno de los urgentes problemas a ser resuelto por la sociedad internacional. 
					Adelanta el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este sabado y continua:
					
					Al librar la guerra antiterrorista, todos los paises en contra del terrorismo deben calar a fondo la intencion criminal de EE.UU. Si no, pueden repetir el destino tragico de numerosos paises y pueblos sufridos durante mas de 10 anos por la "guerra antiterrorista" de EE.UU.
					
					EE.UU. piensa en que si no tiene "enemigo", no podria buscar los pretextos para emplazar sus bases militares en ultramar y tomar la hegemonia mundial.
					
					Bajo el rotulo de la "guerra antiterrorista", EE.UU. cometio a sus caprichos el terror de Estado y los crimenes de lesa humanidad.
					
					En la "guerra antiterrorista" esta oculto el designio norteamericano de derrocar a los paises que le obstaculizan el cumplimiento de la estrategia de hegemonia mundial. Sin embargo, el imperio la describe como defensa de la "libertad y democracia", y no pocos paises y pueblos enganados por ese ardid sufren indecibles desgracias en la voragine de desorden y confusion. 
					
					No hay que tolerar nunca mas la "guerra antiterrorista" de EE.UU. La tolerancia significa la repeticion de los actos terroristas que sufrieron Afganistan, Iraq, Libia, Turquia, Egipto, Francia, Libano y Mali.
